'''''raug''''' or '''''rog''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning '[[demons|demon]]'.<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''rauko''</ref>

Compare the name of [[Rog]], a [[Gnome]]-lord in Gondolin according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

==Etymology==

*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[RUKU]]

==Example==
* [[Balrog]]

==Cognates==

*[[Quenya]] ''[[rauko]]''
